tags.name: place-holder
tags.description:
`place-holder`

Events:

  * `place-holder-replace` {`CustomEvent<string>`} - 

  * `place-holder-file-drop` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `calcText` {`string`} - Calculate text based on the type in the event we have no default.

  * `text` {`string`} - Text place holder for describing this place holder element.

  * `iconFromType` {`string`} - calculate an icon based on the type that was used

  * `type` {`string`} - A media type to visualize and also bubble events off of.

  * `drag-over` {`boolean`} - Bind dragging state to a variable so we can apply CSS.

  * `directions` {`string`} - 

  * `accent-color` {`string`} - a selected accent-"color": grey, red, pink, purple, etc.

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

Properties:

  * `calcText` {`string`} - Calculate text based on the type in the event we have no default.

  * `text` {`string`} - Text place holder for describing this place holder element.

  * `iconFromType` {`string`} - calculate an icon based on the type that was used

  * `type` {`string`} - A media type to visualize and also bubble events off of.

  * `dragOver` {`boolean`} - Bind dragging state to a variable so we can apply CSS.

  * `directions` {`string`} - 

  * `accentColor` {`string`} - a selected accent-"color": grey, red, pink, purple, etc.

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

  * `colors` -
